mainText:
I can't believe it.  I just logged in and saw Steve Jobs' picture and  
the date on the Apple home page.  I was confused at first because I  
hadn't heard anything on the news.  Then I clicked on the picture and  
I am saddened to learn of his passing.  I love my Apple products and I  
will miss Mr. Jobs and his amazing inventions of the future.
author: Stephanie
